item.title: ğŸš¨ CRITICAL: E7001 - Fire22 API Unauthorized - Data Extraction Completely Blocked
item.description:
ğŸš¨ URGENT: Fire22 Data Extraction Completely Blocked

Severity: CRITICAL

Status: 401 Unauthorized on ALL Fire22 API endpoints

ğŸ”´ Immediate Impact:

  • âŒ Customer data sync (2,600+ records) - BLOCKED

  • âŒ Betting data extraction - BLOCKED
  • âŒ Live wager monitoring - BLOCKED

ğŸ¯ Required Action:

Security Team: Provide valid Fire22 API authentication credentials immediately

ğŸ“Š Current Status:

  • Infrastructure: 75% ready (waiting for credentials)

Next Steps: Contact security team immediately for Fire22 API credentials

item.title: ğŸš¨ CRITICAL: E7002 - Bun.secrets Credential Storage Not Functioning
item.description:
ğŸ” CRITICAL: Secure Credential Storage System Down

Error Code: E7002 - FIRE22_CREDENTIALS_STORAGE_FAILED

Severity: CRITICAL

Issue: Bun.secrets.get() returning undefined

ğŸ”´ System Impact:

  • âŒ Cannot store Fire22 API credentials securely
  • âŒ Cannot retrieve stored authentication tokens
  • âŒ Multi-environment credential management broken
  • âŒ Security compliance at risk

ğŸ¯ Required Action:

Infrastructure Team: Verify Bun.secrets and OS credential manager access

Security Team: Validate credential storage policies and permissions

ğŸ”§ Possible Causes:

  • OS credential manager (Keychain/libsecret/CredMan) access denied
  • Missing Bun runtime permissions
  • Credential storage service not running

Temporary Workaround: Environment variables (security risk)
item.author: system@fire22.ag (Fire22 System Monitor)

item.title: ğŸš¨ CRITICAL: E7003 - Fire22 Database Not Connected - Local Storage Blocked
item.description:
ğŸ—„ï¸ CRITICAL: Local Data Storage System Down

Error Code: E7003 - FIRE22_DATABASE_NOT_CONNECTED

Severity: CRITICAL

Issue: SQLite database connection failed

ğŸ”´ Data Storage Impact:

  • âŒ Local Fire22 data storage - BLOCKED
  • âŒ Customer repository operations - FAILED
  • âŒ Agent hierarchy caching - UNAVAILABLE
  • âŒ Transaction logging - DISABLED
  • âŒ Betting data persistence - BLOCKED

ğŸ¯ Required Action:

Database Team: Initialize SQLite database connection

Infrastructure Team: Verify database file permissions and disk space

ğŸ”§ Immediate Solutions:

  • Run: bun run scripts/verify-fire22-database.ts
  • Check permissions: ls -la dashboard.db
  • Test connection: sqlite3 dashboard.db '.tables'

Database Schema: Ready and waiting for connection
item.author: system@fire22.ag (Fire22 System Monitor)

item.title: âš ï¸ ERROR: E7004 - Cloudflare KV Namespaces Missing - Performance Impact
item.description:
âš¡ ERROR: Performance Caching System Unavailable

Error Code: E7004 - CLOUDFLARE_KV_NAMESPACES_MISSING

Severity: ERROR (Non-blocking but performance impacting)

Issue: KV namespace IDs not configured in wrangler.toml

ğŸŸ¡ Performance Impact:

  • âš ï¸ Fire22 API response caching - DISABLED
  • âš ï¸ Authentication token caching - DISABLED
  • âš ï¸ Registry package caching - DISABLED
  • âš ï¸ Slower API response times (no cache hits)

ğŸ¯ Required Action:

DevOps Team: Create and configure Cloudflare KV namespaces

Infrastructure Team: Update wrangler.toml with KV namespace IDs

ğŸ”§ Setup Commands:

  • wrangler kv:namespace create fire22-data-cache
  • wrangler kv:namespace create fire22-auth-cache
  • wrangler kv:namespace create fire22-registry-cache

Priority: Medium (system works but slower without caching)
item.author: system@fire22.ag (Fire22 System Monitor)

item.title: ğŸ“Š Fire22 Dashboard System Status - Multiple Critical Issues Detected
item.description:
ğŸ” Current System Readiness Assessment

Status: âŒ NOT READY - Significant issues blocking operations

âœ… Infrastructure Ready:

  • âœ… Local SQLite schema (Fire22 tables configured)

  • âœ… DNS optimization (sub-millisecond resolution)

âŒ Critical Blockers:
